name: Dawson Diner
text:
Salads
Chef Salad: $16.50 Salad greens, ham, turkey, cheese, tomatoes, red onion, cucumber, and hard-boiled egg.

Caesar Salad: Small $9.00, Large $15.00 Fresh crisp romaine lettuce, bacon bits, parmesan cheese, seasoned croutons, and creamy dressing.

Greek Salad: Small $9.00, Large $15.00 Salad greens, cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, green peppers, black olives, and feta cheese.

Tossed Salad: Small $8.00, Large $13.00 Salad greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, green onions. Add crispy or grilled chicken: $5.00 Add steak strips: $9.00

Soup of the Day: Small $5.00, Large $7.50

Garlic Bread: 3 pieces $4.95

Dinner Classics
Turkey Dinner: $19.00 Tender slices of white and dark meat topped with gravy, savory stuffing, choice of potato, vegetable of the day, and cranberry sauce. White meat only: Add $2.50

Liver & Onions: $19.50 Two pieces of tender baby beef, topped with caramelized onions. Served with choice of potato and vegetable of the day.

Pork Chop Dinner: $19.50 Two grilled pork chops served with choice of potato, vegetable of the day, and a side of apple sauce.

Salisbury Steak: $19.50 12 oz seasoned beef patty topped with grilled onions and smothered in gravy. Served with choice of potato and vegetable of the day.

Steak Dinner: $19.50 6 oz seared striploin steak served with grilled garlic bread, choice of potato, and vegetable of the day. Add sautéed mushrooms and onions: $2.50

Beer Battered Haddock: $20.50 8-1/2 oz battered fillet served with fries, coleslaw, and a side of tartar sauce.

Pastas
Chicken Parmesan: $19.50 Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese served on a bed of spaghetti with a side of garlic bread.

Lasagna: $18.50 Layers of lasagna noodles, creamy ricotta cheese, savory homemade Italian meat sauce, and topped with grilled mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of garlic bread.

Additional Information
All dinner classics are served with your choice of salad or soup-of-the-day.

Upgrade to Greek or Caesar salad: Add $1.50

Senior’s Menu

Breakfast
Omelette - $12.00 Two egg cheese omelette with your choice of 2 fillings. Choose from: bacon, ham, sausage, onion, green pepper, tomato, or mushrooms. Served with one slice of toast and home fries.

Fresh Plate - $11.00 Kickstart your day with a nutritious and tasty breakfast plate! Includes a side of seasonal fresh fruit, creamy yogurt, and your choice of a fresh muffin-of-the-day or a toasted English muffin. Goodness in every bite!

Dinner
Salisbury Steak - $15.50 One 6 oz patty topped with fried onions and gravy. Served with choice of potato and vegetable of the day.

Fish & Chips - $15.50 A smaller portion of our battered Haddock. Served with coleslaw, tartar sauce, and fries.

Beverages
Coffee - $2.75

Tea - $2.75

Milk (SM $3.00, LG $4.00)

Chocolate Milk (SM $3.00, LG $4.00)

Juice (apple, orange, cranberry) (SM $3.00, LG $4.00)

Hot Chocolate - $3.00

Bottled Water - $2.25

Bottled Pop - $4.00

Canned Pop - $3.00

Hot Sandwiches
Hot Turkey - $17.50 Juicy mix of homecooked white and dark meat piled high and smothered in turkey gravy. White meat only ADD $2.50.

Hot Roast Beef - $17.50 In-house slow roasted beef sliced thin, piled high, and smothered in beef gravy.

Hot Hamburger - $17.50 6 oz patty cooked to juicy perfection. Served on bread and smothered in gravy.

Hot Hamburger Nip - $17.50 Served on a bun with mustard, relish, and onion and smothered in beef gravy.

Everyday Favourites
Perogies - $16.50 6 locally made classic potato and cheddar cheese filling, sautéed with onions and bacon, and served with sour cream.

Quesadilla - $16.50 A large flour tortilla, generously filled with beef, chicken, or pulled pork, topped with cheddar cheese and tomatoes. Served with sour cream and salsa.

Chicken Fingers - $16.00 4 tender strips of chicken breast breaded and fried to a golden-brown. Served with dipping sauce.

Chicken Caesar Wrap - $16.00 Crispy chicken breast, bacon, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing in a flour tortilla.

BBQ Pulled Pork - $16.50 Savory BBQ pulled pork, slow-cooked and piled high on a toasted bun topped with crunchy coleslaw and crispy onions.

Classic Philly Cheesesteak - $16.50 Thin Philly-style steak with sautéed mushrooms, onions, peppers, and melted cheese on a hoagie bun.

Sides
Fries - $8.00

Gravy - $3.00

Coleslaw - $2.00

Sweet Potato Fries - $9.00

Poutine - $10.50

Onion Rings - $8.50

Garlic Bread - $4.95

ALL-DAY BREAKFAST

Pancakes 11.50 A TASTE OF TRUE NORDIC TRADITION. Three thin and delicate Finnish style pancakes cooked perfectly light and golden — OR — 3 fluffy golden-brown pancakes sprinkled with powdered sugar.

Belgian Waffle 13.50 A decadent thick and airy Belgian waffle, crispy and golden-brown on the outside and fluffy on the inside. Served with syrup, butter and a bit of OMG! Add our silky strawberry or blueberry sauce and whipped cream to any of the above for an additional 5.00

French Toast 12.50 Three thickly sliced, lightly grilled, cinnamon-vanilla French toast dusted with powdered sugar.

Stuffed French Toast 17.50 BERRY-CREAM — Our classic French toast stuffed with sweet cream cheese and strawberry or blueberry sauce. Sprinkled with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream. — OR — S’MORES… A campfire classic reimagined. Nutella and marshmallow fluff stuffed into our classic French toast, topped with whipped cream, mini chocolate chips and crumbled graham cookies.

Lappe Lumberjack 18.50 YOU DON’T HAVE TO WEAR PLAID TO ORDER THIS! 3 eggs, 3 bacon, 3 sausages, 3 ham, home fries and your choice of 3 mini fluffy — OR — Finnish pancakes — OR — 3 slices of toast.

Classic Breakfast 14.00 ALL YOUR FAVOURITES! 2 eggs with your choice of ham, bacon or sausage, 2 slices of toast and home fries.

Big 2 15.00 FOR THOSE OF US WHO NEED SWEET AND SAVOURY. 2 eggs, 2 bacon, 2 sausage and 2 pancakes (Finnish or fluffy)

Steak & Eggs 18.50 INDULGE IN OUR CLASSIC HEARTY MORNING OPTION! 6 oz tender grilled triploin steak served with 2 eggs, toast and home fries.

Diner Breakfast Club 17.50 A TRIPLE DECKER DELIGHT, PERFECT FOR BREAKFAST LOVERS! Eggs, bacon, tomato, ham and cheese on 3 pieces of warm toast. Served with home fries.

Eggs Benedict 16.50 A CROWD FAVOURITE! Two perfectly poached eggs with your choice of ham or bacon, nestled on top of a griddled English muffin. Generously topped with velvety Hollandaise sauce and sprinkled with paprika. Served with a side of home fries and a lot of MM-MM-MMM. UPGRADE to peameal bacon: ADD 2.50

Fresh Breakfast Plate 13.00 ON THE LIGHTER SIDE! A fresh take on breakfast with a side of seasonal fruit. Creamy Greek yogurt topped with granola and honey and choice of fresh muffin-of-the-day or toasted English muffin.

Omelettes Our 3-egg omelettes are generously portioned and packed with your favourite fillings. Served with golden hash browns and a side of toast. Start with… CHEDDAR CHEESE 13.50 Add your choice of filling, ADD 1.00 each: Ham, bacon, sausage, mushroom, onion, green pepper, tomato

Around the World in Easy Days

The CANADIAN 16.50 bacon, ham, sausage and cheese

The AMERICAN 17.50 bacon, ham, mushrooms, onions, peppers, tomato and cheese

The GREEK 16.50 black olives, red onions, tomato, green pepper and feta cheese

The MEXICAN 16.00 taco beef, onion, peppers, cheese and salsa

The CALIFORNIAN 17.00 tomato, onion, peppers, mushrooms, spinach and cheese

The SPICY ITALIAN 18.00 hot mortadella, hot capicola, hot sausage, hot peppers and provolone cheese

Scramblers ADD 3.00 Make any of your favourite omelettes into a delicious scrambler, smothered in rich velvety Hollandaise sauce.

Breakfast Sides

Toast & Jam 3.50

Hollandaise Sauce 4.00

1 Egg 2.50

Fruit Cup 2.95

Diner Sandwiches
Sliced Turkey: $9.50

White turkey slices, lettuce, cheese, mayo, and cranberry sauce.

BLT: $9.50

Bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

Egg Salad or Tuna Salad: $9.00

Grilled Cheese: $9.00

Add ham or bacon for $1.00.

Western: $9.75

Bacon, tomato, onion, and cheddar cheese.

Denver: $9.75

Ham, onion, and cheddar cheese.

Specialty Sandwiches
Monte Cristo: $17.00

Tender white meat turkey slices, ham, Swiss cheese, and mayo, between two pieces of bread dipped in egg and cooked until golden.

Turkey Clubhouse: $17.50

Turkey breast, bacon, tomato, lettuce, and mayo.

Steak Sandwich: $18.50

6 oz striploin steak with sautéed onions, bell peppers, and melted cheese on a toasted hoagie bun.

Reuben: $17.00

Corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and Thousand Island mayo on grilled marble rye.

Pattie Melt: $17.00

6 oz patty with sautéed onions, cheddar cheese, and Thousand Island mayo on marble rye.

Diner Burgers
Hamburger: $12.50

Cheeseburger: $13.50

Bacon Cheeseburger: $14.50

Specialty Burgers
Double-D Burger: $19.00

Two 6 oz patties with BBQ sauce, American cheese, bacon, onion rings, and a fried egg on a toasted bun.

Mushroom Swiss Burger: $17.00

Sautéed mushrooms and onions, Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli.

Mozzo Burger: $17.00

Bacon, mozzarella cheese, lettuce, tomato, and Thousand Island dressing.

Finn Burger: $18.00

Two 6 oz patties with cheese, lettuce, tomato, red onion, and Finn mustard.

Crispy Chicken Burger: $17.00

Breaded and fried chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

Buffalo Chicken Burger: $17.50

Hot Honey Chicken Burger: $17.50

Upgrades
Poutine: Add $6.00

Onion rings: Add $3.00

Sweet potato fries: Add $2.00

Greek or Caesar Salad: Add $1.50

Add fries, side salad, or cup of soup to any sandwich for an additional $5.00.

All sandwiches are served on your choice of white, brown, or rye bread and served with pickle slices. Marble rye: Add $1.50. Gluten-free: Add $1.50
